title: FULL SUPPORTER TEAM Member Search!
body:
I search for good supports which want to have some fun with a full 5 Supporter Team and tryhard to win :D
How to play?: 1 Top 1 Jungle 1 Mid 2 Bot or 2 Top and no Jungle but all are playing supporter Champs. The Items you buy are not restricted to anything so we can have 1 Full AD Support as well. Its just real fun to win games like this as a team and it feels pretty good :D If you want to join or try out, ad me or write a comment; )

replies.body:
Hi^^,

im Janna main and I play her only mid :D. Taric top also sometimes.
This sounds so perfect xD Add me ; )
wrong forum - this is german only
I don't think that playing on an EUW Server means you have to speak german : )
But you have to speak german here ;) If you are looking for english players u need to swap the language at the top from german to english.
